Posts.Content: My mother was on Tamoxifen for five years and had a whole host of side effects. Feel free to contact her through her blog: www.faithhopeandlattes.blogspot.com. (her email is on there). I think her main side effects were skin and hair thinning, and joint swelling, along with the tiredness. Hang in there Nellie! This too shall pass....
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen Tiredness
